text: "Shadows of the Night" is a 1982 song by Pat Benatar and is the lead single from her fourth studio album Get Nervous. It won Benatar a Grammy Award in 1983. It went to number 12 in Canada, number 13 in the United States, number 19 in Australia and number 32 in New Zealand. Category:1982 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Pat Benatar songs
title: Shadows of the Night
